content: the large gap at each corner round 10 with c2 repeat round 4 of the throw you will work each new corner in spaces of the round 11 with c3 repeat round 4 previous round you will then work 3 double crochets in the chain 1 space along the sides of the throw round 12 with c4 repeat round 4 corner instructions corner round 13 with c5 repeat round 4 in chain 2 space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet round 14 with c6 repeat round 4 directions round 15 final round join c7 to any chain 2 space chain 2 2 half_double_crochet ch2 3 half_double_crochet with c1 chain 4 and join with slip_stitch to form a ring in same space * work chain 1 3 half_double_crochet in all chain 1 sps to next corner chain 1 3 half_double_crochet 2 chain 3 half_double_crochet in chain 2 space* repeat from * 2 more times ch1 3 round 1 chain 3 counts as 1 double_crochet here and throughout pattern work 2 half_double_crochet in all chain 1 space to end join with slip_stitch in top of beg chain 3 fasten double_crochet in ring *chain 2 3 double_crochet in ring* repeat from * 2 more times chain 2 join off with slip_stitch in top of beg chain 3 round 2 slip_stitch in the next 2 double_crochet and in the chain 2 space into the first finishing corner chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in same space *chain 1 work corner see weave in all ends wash and gently block instructions in
